name: Sweet Marketing
description:
Sweet is a marketing communications agency built on more than 40 years of experience across FMCG, B2B, B2C and technical accounts, perfected on brands like BSI, Chemist Direct, The Environment Agency, Land Rover, Holland & Barrett, Next Directory, Severn Trent Water, The SMMT and Wedgwood. We have fun crafting your solutions - but we’re constantly mindful of the serious need to optimise your ROI, and our particular role in optimising your MROI.
Sweet people include marketing strategists, creative teams, digital specialists, marketing automation experts, PR practitioners and more. Our team are articulate, approachable and powerfully motivated to immerse themselves in your brief, get to know the target and fully understand the market. Then, to provide devastatingly effective communications. We can deliver any message to any market.
